page.title: 16Langtoft Parish Council
page.content: The Parish Council has eleven members and Mrs Wilkinson is the clerk. Mr Dowson is the chairman and Mr Dixon is vice chairman.The job is not an every day job.It is just done when it needs to be done.They look after the village and keep it tidy.If a job needs doing like a swing at the park is broken Mrs. Wilkinson lets the Council know about it. They have a meeting every 6 weeks and it takes place in the school.In April every year anyone is allowed to go and complain about things that haven't been done that should have been done. Every year the Parish Council has a visit from the Chief Executive of the East Yorkshire Borough Council to see how things are getting done.
